attributes.action: Withdraw UK support for any operations in Syria
attributes.additional_details: This is a resubmission of the petition "Withdraw UK support for any operations in Syria." (https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/113198) which, in turn, was submitted after the petition "Withdraw all UK forces from Syria and end UK involvement in the war" (https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/112050) was rejected after it was deemed "not clear" what it was asking the government to do, and advised that I petition for "the UK to withdraw its support for any operations in Syria"
attributes.background: This petition follows a previously rejected petition to "Withdraw UK support for any operations in Syria" after it was rejected because it "was created using a fake or incomplete name". They advised that if I resubmit my petition using my full name, they'll "be able to approve it."
